description: A creature with the body of a human above and lion's hindquarters and tail below shares a crowded elevator with human passengers. The absurd juxtaposition of a wild animalistic form in a mundane, confined environment is immediately apparent. The accompanying caption offers ironic reassurance, stating the creature is "completely harmless unless something startles him." This condition injects a specific sense of unpredictable danger into the ordinary setting, playing on the potential for chaos when wildness is barely contained and easily provoked.
caption: “Don’t be alarmed, folks—he’s completely harmless unless something startles him.”
